ModMetaData.name: RomanceAgeFix
ModMetaData.author: Aquin
ModMetaData.description:
2025年5月30日更新： 同时添加了生育年龄的修改，替换为了本mod中的计算方法，让长生种生育不会再有额外的年龄惩罚。
Updated on May 30, 2025: Added fertility age modification on replacing the original calculation method with the one in this mod, allowing long-lived races to reproduce without additional age penalties.
---------------------------------------------------------- 这个mod修改了对于长生种的恋爱几率中年龄因素的影响，让她们能够更好的和短生种相爱了。
This mod modifies the effect of age on romance probability for long-lived races, allowing them to better love short-lived races.
